headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks in the Doghouse
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is often seen as a benchmark for strong businesses, but that doesn’t mean every stock is worth owning. Some companies face significant challenges, whether it’s stagnating growth, heavy debt, or disruptive new competitors.

headline: Spotting Winners: Acuity Brands (NYSE:AYI) And Electrical Systems Stocks In Q1
summary: Wrapping up Q1 earnings, we look at the numbers and key takeaways for the electrical systems stocks, including Acuity Brands (NYSE:AYI) and its peers.
